Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2007 03:54PM Micki22 wrote: Let me know if they see the lymph nodes by ultrasound, because I just had one Wednesday and my two lymph nodes were barely seen and I was told again that nothing looked suspicious. The mammogram showed them and they were not concerned because they were very rounded and not star like, which could indicate cancer.
